## Path2 class

Represents a 2D path made up of multiple 2D points

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class Path2 
```

## Constructors

|  Constructor | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [(constructor)(x, y)](./decentraland-ecs.path2.(constructor).md) |  | Creates a Path2 object from the starting 2D coordinates x and y. |

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [closed](./decentraland-ecs.path2.closed.md) |  | <code>boolean</code> | If the path start and end point are the same |

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [addArcTo(midX, midY, endX, endY, numberOfSegments)](./decentraland-ecs.path2.addarcto.md) |  | Adds \_numberOfSegments\_ segments according to the arc definition (middle point coordinates, end point coordinates, the arc start point being the current Path2 last point) to the current Path2. |
|  [addLineTo(x, y)](./decentraland-ecs.path2.addlineto.md) |  | Adds a new segment until the given coordinates (x, y) to the current Path2. |
|  [close()](./decentraland-ecs.path2.close.md) |  | Closes the Path2. |
|  [getPointAtLengthPosition(normalizedLengthPosition)](./decentraland-ecs.path2.getpointatlengthposition.md) |  | Retreives the point at the distance aways from the starting point |
|  [getPoints()](./decentraland-ecs.path2.getpoints.md) |  | Gets the points which construct the path |
|  [length()](./decentraland-ecs.path2.length.md) |  | Gets the sum of the distance between each sequential point in the path |
|  [StartingAt(x, y)](./decentraland-ecs.path2.startingat.md) | <code>static</code> | Creates a new path starting from an x and y position |
